author: .galimba
content:
Hey guys, hope everythings running smoothly. I wanted to ask if there is an estimated timeline for `Add new ERC:` PRs to be reviewed by editors. We created this EIP in June, then it got skipped over in the notifications for migration, and we finally moved the PR to ERCs repository a few months ago. 

Here's the PR -> https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/90
and Magicians discussion -> https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/erc-7208-on-chain-data-container/14778
